summary: RaceMenu Preset File For My Char: Nina
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][color=#6d9eeb][size=6][b]-Requirements-[/b][/size][/color]
[size=3]
[/size][b][size=3][color=#6d9eeb]-RaceMenu-[/color]
[color=#6d9eeb]-True Eyes- [/color]
[color=#6d9eeb]-KS hairdos (Google It!)-[/color]
[color=#6d9eeb]-Brows-[/color]


[b][color=#e06666][b][size=6]-Vampires-[/size]

[/b][size=3]-Better Vampire Fangs and Eyes-
[/size][size=3]-No Vampire Sunken Face for ECE-[/size][/color][/b][/size][/b]

[size=3]
[/size][b][color=#c27ba0][size=6]-Installation-[/size][/color][/b]
[size=3]
Once you have downloaded the file, open and extract the Nina.slot to a convenient location e.g. desktop.

Then locate your preset folder. (If these folder do not exist, just make them)

[color=#c27ba0][b]MODORGANIZER - (ModOrganizer\overwrite\skse\plugins\CharGen\Presets)
SKYRIM DIRECTORY - (Data\SKSE\Plugins\CharGen\Presets)[/b][/color]

After that rename the Nina.slot to a number from 1 - 50 and then simply drag and drop into the folder (Example [b]10.slot[/b])[/size]
[size=3]

[/size][color=#f6b26b][size=6][b]-Recommendations-[/b][/size][/color]
[size=3]
[b][color=#f6b26b]-Pretty Lips-
-Breton Race-
-Women Of Skyrim-
-High Res Warpaint-
-Better Makeup for SKSE-
-Familiar Faces (so you can make her a follower)-[/color][/b]


Nina is a Breton Girl, so for the best result I recommend a Breton Character, just my opinion though. 
[/size][/font][size=4]Feel free to change her appearance to how you want her to look, otherwise enjoy.

Credit to expired6978 for the RaceMenu Mod so that this could be possible :).[/size]
[list]
[/list][font=Arial][/font][/center]
author: Undeadgoblin
